about_the_game:
Dive into the release of the Hail to the King update for Evil Dead: the Game with a new bundle featuring Army of Darkness!

● New Survivor: The Blacksmith: A hybrid support hero with some warrior characteristics, the Blacksmith is a master with all melee weapons, but unable to use ranged weapons. The Blacksmith is also able to increase his max health, and increase his and his nearby Survivors' damage using amulets.

● Ash Halloween Outfit: Nobody is more ready for Halloween than the chosen one himself! Shop smart by grabbing this groovy free costume for Ash Williams from Army of Darkness to take down Deadites in style.

● Ash: Sellsword Outfit
● Henry the Red: Red Pikeman Outfit
● Henry the Red: Berserker Cosplay Outfit
● Lord Arthur: Rightful King Outfit
detailed_description:
Dive into the release of the Hail to the King update for Evil Dead: the Game with a new bundle featuring Army of Darkness!

● New Survivor: The Blacksmith: A hybrid support hero with some warrior characteristics, the Blacksmith is a master with all melee weapons, but unable to use ranged weapons. The Blacksmith is also able to increase his max health, and increase his and his nearby Survivors' damage using amulets.

● Ash Halloween Outfit: Nobody is more ready for Halloween than the chosen one himself! Shop smart by grabbing this groovy free costume for Ash Williams from Army of Darkness to take down Deadites in style.

● Ash: Sellsword Outfit
● Henry the Red: Red Pikeman Outfit
● Henry the Red: Berserker Cosplay Outfit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 7400 / Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700/ Ryzen 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 Ti/ RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible soundcard

short_description: Dive into the release of the Hail to the King update with exciting new content! • New Survivor: The Blacksmith • New Outfits: ◦Ash Halloween ◦Ash: Sellsword ◦Henry the Red: Red Pikeman ◦Henry the Red: Berserker Cosplay ◦Lord Arthur: Rightful King
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean
